title: Enhancing Science Learning Effectiveness through Co-Teaching in Blended Synchronous Instruction

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Blended synchronous science lesson design for elementary education majors and job-seeking students in hybrid online-offline settings.

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three role-sharing strategies between online and offline instructors in a co-teaching model.
Learners can analyze collaborative cases among teachers in blended synchronous classes and propose methods to enhance student engagement.
When designing science experiments, learners can apply co-teaching methods to develop instructional materials and establish execution plans.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
